title: ResourceType
description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM resource type

id.description: The resource type's server unique id. May be the same as the 'name' attribute.

name.description: The resource type name.  When applicable, service providers MUST specify the name, e.g., 'User'.

description.description: The resource type's human-readable description.  When applicable, service providers MUST specify the description.

endpoint.description: The resource type's HTTP-addressable endpoint relative to the Base URL, e.g., '/Users'.

schema.description: The resource type's primary/base schema URI.

schemaExtensions.description: A list of URIs of the resource type's schema extensions.

schema.description: The URI of a schema extension.

required.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether or not the schema extension is required for the resource type.  If true, a resource of this type MUST include this schema extension and also include any attributes declared as required in this schema extension. If false, a resource of this type MAY omit this schema extension.
